headline.main: Getting Sick on Other People's Smoke

docs.lead_paragraph: To the Editor: The R.J. Reynolds Company has demonstrated how the quest for profits can distort logic and fact. In its June 11 full-page ad, ''The Secondhand Smokescreen,'' the company condemns zealous opponents of tobacco for saying passive smoking causes disease, in the absence of established scientific fact.
